titleStmt.title: The Quakers shaken: or, A fire-brand snach'd out of the fire. Being a briefe relation of Gods wonderfull mercie extended to John Gilpin of Kendale in Westmoreland. Who, as will appeare by the sequel, was not only deluded, but possessed by the devill.
titleStmt.author: Gilpin, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Simon Waterson, and are to be sold at the Crown in Pauls Church-Yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
